rows.label: qev087301_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, Elma. I've been lookin' for ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Here to foist another problematic
assignment on my teammates?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0003
rows.name: Nagi?! ...The hell you doin' here?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0004
rows.name: Isn't it obvious?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Elma has taken me under her wing,
and is helping me hone my skills as a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0006
rows.name: Hone your skills as a BLADE?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0007
rows.name: He's aiding us on the side as his schedule allows.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0008
rows.name: Think of it as a form of...stress relief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Exactly. I only ask to be treated the same
as any rank-and-file BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0010
rows.name: Well, I guess if Elma's okay with it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0011
rows.name: Speaking of which, didn't you say you were looking for Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0012
rows.name: Oh, right. The emergency![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0013
rows.name: Those damn Ganglion captured Orton's squad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0014
rows.name: Captured? Are you sure it's not just a communication problem?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0015
rows.name:
We're sure. They were escorting
some Mediators who just got back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0016
rows.name:
They saw Orton and his men
taken prisoner with their own eyes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0017
rows.name: This sounds serious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev087301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about the Mediators.

rows.label: qev087301_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev087301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask where they were taken.

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'm as curious as you are,
but they're still being treated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Let them rest. We'll get whatever data we need
from their comm devices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0020
rows.name: That's the million-dollar question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0021
rows.name: Let's check the Mediators' comm devices for data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0022
rows.name:
The direction the Ganglion came from
may give us a clue as to where they're based.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0023
rows.name: Good idea. I'll have someone take a look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0024
rows.name: In the meantime, we should hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Elma is right. Ganglion might want to cook and eat
Mediator friends just like they tried with poor Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0026
rows.name: Easy now, let's not let our imaginations—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0027
rows.name:
On the contrary. There are a lot of things
we don't know about the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0028
rows.name:
We can't rule out anything at this point,
including what—or who—they might eat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0029
rows.name: Oh, barf![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0030
rows.name: Elma—ma'am. I suggest we head out immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0031
rows.name:
Now wait just one damn minute.
We need our secretary of defense here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0032
rows.name:
It'll be easier to command from the field.
Besides, I AM part of Elma's team for the time being.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0033
rows.name: Yeah, you said that, but—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0034
rows.name:
Commander? He's not going to change his mind,
and we don't have time to argue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0035
rows.name: There you have it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087301_MSG0036
rows.name: Ehh, fine. Get to it.[ST:wait ]
